data.title: Our Impact â€” Albuquerque Involved
data.text:
Since we began collecting member donations for our grant program in August 2013, our members have given over $325,000 in grants to local nonprofit organizations. Beginning in 2022, ABQ Involved changed our grant giving model to award multiple grants per month, as well as additional grants for unexpected expenses and more immediate needs.

We have participated in over one hundred volunteer projects since 2013, and we continue to offer 3 volunteer events every month!

Our projects range from cleaning parks, sorting food, winterizing a farm, preparing Thanksgiving meals, cooking food for children and families in need, cleaning kitchens, repairing playgrounds, serving food to the needy, helping walk and water dogs for adoption, and assisting fundraising efforts.

Our work has benefited the following local organizations, among others:

Rio Grande Open Space

Roadrunner Food Bank

Mandy's Farm

Crossroads for Women

Children's Grief Center

Ronald McDonald House

Meals on Wheels

Cuidando de los Ninos

UNM Spring Storm

Noon Day Ministries

PACA

Saranam

NM Natural History Museum

Kayak NM

Title I APS Homeless Project

Ranchito de los Ninos

Storehouse

Querencia Green

Girls on the Run
